document_data.name: ''Oberon's Airy Lash''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Oberon's Airy Lash''''' was a unique magic [[ring]], part of the ''Fading Rings'' set, that bore the name of the [[sylvan]] deity [[Oberon]] .
document_data.Description: This ring was a delicately woven band of tanned leather strips.
document_data.Powers: ''Oberon's Airy Lash'' was only usable by [[sorcerer]]s and possessed an enchantment that increased the wearer's initiative in exchange for reduced spell resistance. Additionally, this leather ring allowed its owner to cast the ''[[chain lightning]]'' spell.
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], ''Oberon's Airy Lash'' was locked inside a magical and mysterious monument, ''the Great Stone Head''. The statue was located in the [[Nightingale Court]] of the ruined [[Myth Drannor]]. In exchange for one of the ''[[eidolon]]s'', small totem-like statuettes depicting various gods, the monument dispensed powerful magic rings. One such ring was the elegant leather ''Fading Ring'', ''Oberon's Airy Lash''.
